item.title: Linux Manual
item.description: Vim: Three Modes # Normal mode Insert mode Command mode Command Mode # Type : to enter. w (write): save. q: quit. x (==wq): save and quit. set nu: show line numbers. set nonu: do not show line numbers. Normal Mode # y (yank): copy. p: paste. 5yy: copy 4 lines. dd: delete. 4dd: delete 4 lines. /word_to_search + Enter: search a word. n: next. G: last line. gg (go to the top…): first line.
